project_descr: Support to the Implementation and Improvement of the National Target Programmes for Poverty Reduction

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Improved design and more effective implementation of national target programme for poverty reduction (NTPPR) and national programme for socio-economic development for poorest mountainous and ethnic minority communes (P135).
